In the solution explorer, find the `notf-thirdparty` project.
Right-click it and choose `Build Dependencies -> Build Customizations`.
In the `Visual C++ Build Customization Files` dialog, enable `masm`.
In the solution explorer, select the three *.asm files, right-click and select `Properties`.
In `Configuration Properties -> General -> Item Type` choose `Microsoft Macro Assembler`.
In `Configuration Properties -> General -> Microsoft Macro Assembler` go to `Preprocessor Definitions` and add "BOOST_CONTEXT_EXPORT"
